events.description: Kyle Schwarber walks.
Edmundo Sosa grounds into a double play, second baseman Luis Guillorme to shortstop Francisco Lindor to first baseman Pete Alonso. Kyle Schwarber out at 2nd. Edmundo Sosa out at 1st. 2 outs
Bryce Harper walks.

Francisco Lindor walks.
DJ Stewart pops out to second baseman Bryson Stott on the infield fly rule. 2 outs
